channel.title: How do i change
channel.description: how do i change the starter player looks, i quit coding for a while :( im slowly making my server, i dont wanna know how to change what armour you wear when you login, just how the looks are when you login

item.title: How do i change
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

player.java
//Setting player standard look
playerLook[0] = 0;
playerLook[1] = 7;
playerLook[2] = 8;
playerLook[3] = 9;
playerLook[4] = 5;
playerLook[5] = 0;

	/*playerLook[0] = 1;
	playerLook[1] = 5;
	playerLook[2] = 5;
	playerLook[3] = 6;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 10;*/

i thnk thats it bt if not here
/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/

	pHead=7;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=29;
	pHands=35;
	pLegs=39;
	pFeet=44;
	pBeard=14;

	/*pHead=3;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=26;
	pHands=34;
	pLegs=36;
	pFeet=42;
	pBeard=0;*/
